summary: This is a certification from Municipal Credit Union responding to a subpoena (SUB9316-DJ) regarding business records. The certification states that checks and credit card statements are not applicable and do not contain Suspicious Activity Reports or Currency Transaction Reports, which would be handled separately by the BSA Department.

events.title: Business Record Certification Submission
events.description: Municipal Credit Union submits a certification of business records in response to subpoena SUB9316-DJ, indicating checks and credit card statements are not applicable and SARs/CTRs are handled separately.

keyFacts: Municipal Credit Union responded to subpoena SUB9316-DJ with a business record certification.
The certification states that checks and credit card statements are 'Not Applicable' to the records produced.
The records do not contain Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) or Currency Transaction Reports (CTRs), which would be handled by the BSA Department separately.
The document is dated 2019 and certified by a notary public with commission expiring April 12, 2022.
